element.name: Patient's Phone Number
element.v3Comment: This element contains an attribute to define what type of phone number is being documented (e.g., Fax, Home, Mobile, Pager, and Work).

asserts.assert: When Patient's Phone Number has a Pertinent Negative, it should be empty and it should not have a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting).

When Patient's Phone Number is empty, it should have a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting, if allowed for the element) or a Pertinent Negative (if allowed for the element), or it should be omitted (if the element is optional).
When Patient's Phone Number has a Pertinent Negative, no other value should be recorded.
